SavedLv1_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Dear me, was that dire! You saved my life!
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Tired_00>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> They took a chunk out of me...


A doctor I may be, but it's difficult to
treat one's own wounds.
Talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Are you here because you saw that
call for applications in the newspaper?<sp:5:0:0>
You better make sure you're prepared.
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Sad_01>So far, every single applicant has been
turned down...<sp:5:0:0>including yours truly.<sp:0:4:0>If anyone out there could win the favor
of the brilliant, young mind that's running
the project, I'd really like to meet them.
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oww...<sp:5:0:0> I can't stay here. I need to find
somewhere to rest...
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>Whatever that is, it's terrifying! <sp:5:0:0>Run!
Run for your life!
Talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well then. Guess I'll go back to my old job
researching the <clr:0000>Zonai ruins<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>If you're here to interview as a <clr:0000>Depths
explorer<clr:ffff>, I'd advise against getting your
hopes up.
That Josha's standards are high!
SavedLv3_01: <sp:3:0:2:0b00>I'm in awe. <sp:5:0:0>How did you do that?
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>You came just in time.<sp:5:1:0> I'm sorry I couldn't
do it on my own.
Talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Are you also here to interview for the
<clr:0000>investigation of the Depths<clr:ffff>? My adviceâ€”
bring your very best.
So far, not one single applicant has made
it through.<sp:0:4:0>I know Josha is a prodigy, so she's

SavedLv2_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000><snd:Ease><clr:ffff>Monsters know how to ruin a good walk...<sp:5:1:0>
Anyway, thank you for saving me!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Thanks for your help, young man!<sp:5:0:0>
I'm sorry to say, I didn't even bring
a weapon...
Talk_0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_00>Oh, you're the fellow from the other day!
Lookout Landing continues to surprise.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Sorry to trouble you... <sp:5:1:0>Are you OK?<sp:5:1:0>
You're not injured, are you?
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Phewww... And they say youths don't
look after their elders!
Thanks00: <sp:3:0:2:0701>Here. It's the least I owe you.
